price: 当我们听见正道的时候，我们已信仰它。谁信仰主，谁不怕克扣，也不怕受辱。
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lammā samiʿ'nā al-hudā āmannā bihi faman yu'min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqan
